name: spotify-personal-auth
author: Tomer Aberbach <tomeraberbach@gmail.com> (https://tomeraberba.ch)
description: A Spotify authorization code flow implementation for local personal use.

scripts.publish:patch: npm test && npm version patch -m "%s" && npm publish && npm run publish:git
scripts.publish:minor: npm test && npm version minor -m "%s" && npm publish && npm run publish:git
scripts.publish:major: npm test && npm version major -m "%s" && npm publish && npm run publish:git
